author: Rebecca Klar
title: Gottlieb: 'Let's not have to say in the fall we wish we'd done more in the spring'
description: Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said officials should have an immediate focus on developing a drug to treat the coronavirus or they risk wishing more had been done. "If we'd taken certain...
content:
Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb said officials should have an immediate focus on developing a drug to treat the coronavirus or they risk wishing more had been done. 
If we'd taken certain steps in winter - and recognized #coronavirus had characteristi… [+1949 chars]
